channel.title: Grant Hendry on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Grant Hendry on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Sense Scotland: supporting disabled people and their families
item.description: MM - Michael McEwan GT - Graeme Thomson GH - Grant Hendry This is Iriss.fm, internet radio for Scotland Social Services. In this episode for Iriss.fm, I went out to Sense Scotland at TouchBase in Glasgow where I interviewed a Grant Hendry, one of the support workers at Sense Scotland, but first up let’s hear the interview that I did with their Communications Officer at Sense Scotland, Graeme Thomson. MM First of all, what is Sense Scotland?
